body:
@mythmon @andymikulski Something I noticed was that in some cases the stripe colors can be the same as the background color. I'm not sure if this is intentional or if I made a mistake in my implementation?

Original shield (hex codes also match so I am fairly confident that the color is the same):
![screenshot-2017-8-21 http localhost](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1198628/29540182-129e6494-8682-11e7-8020-c5a45c39340e.png)
(for reference, this was generated with seed `v1:foobat.svg`)

Same shield with black stripes:
![screenshot-2017-8-21 http localhost 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1198628/29540237-4b3d42d4-8682-11e7-8286-639b45f82349.png)

This does not occur for all striped shields, ex: 
![screenshot-2017-8-21 http localhost 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1198628/29540257-65e32112-8682-11e7-86b4-2a517f1467fc.png)
